sources.title: The Pilgrim Lady
sources.description: Title: The Pilgrim Lady Summary: Dennis Carter ( Warren Douglas ), the head of a detective agency, and his secretary, Henrietta Rankin ( Lynne Roberts ), get involved in the murder of a scandal-peddling, blackmailing radio ... Directed by: Lesley Selander Actors: Lynne Roberts, Warren Douglas, Alan Mowbray Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 22 January 1947 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Dennis Carter (Warren Douglas), the head of a detective agency, and his secretary, Henrietta Rankin (Lynne Roberts), get involved in the murder of a scandal-peddling, blackmailing radio commentator, and evidence point toward Henrietta. Dennis sets out to clear her and also find the real culprits.

metadata.Plot: Dennis Carter (Warren Douglas), the head of a detective agency, and his secretary, Henrietta Rankin (Lynne Roberts), get involved in the murder of a scandal-peddling, blackmailing radio commentator, and evidence point toward Henrietta. Dennis sets out to clear her and also find the real culprits.
metadata.Actors: Lynne Roberts, Warren Douglas, Alan Mowbray
